channel.title: PI - Dieing or spawning an item
channel.description: When you die and drop 2147483647 of an item, I want to change the 2147483647 to 1. Or a spawning limit would work, so you can't spawn more than 50,000 of an item at one time. Thanks.

item.title: PI - Dieing or spawning an item
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

if(newItemAmount == Integer.MAX_VALUE) { c.sendMessage("Nope buddy that's over the limit."); return; }

Add it before the adding of the item in the item command.
You can change the limit.

For the dropping…

in the createGroundItem void just add

if(itemAmount == Integer.MAX_VALUE) { itemAmount = 1; }

Read full topic
